mutants.code:
def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character - string[position + 1:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return (string[:position] + character) * string[position + 1:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] - character + string[position + 1:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] * character + string[position + 1:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character + string[position - 1:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character + string[position * 1:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character + string[position + 2:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character + string[position + 0:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character + string[position + 0:]

def mutate_string(string, position, character):
    return string[:position] + character + string[position + -1:]
